name: Blizzard StarCraft 2 Modification File
summary: Learn about .SC2MOD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: SC2MOD files can be created with the StarCraft II Editor (also called the "Galaxy Editor"), which is included with the StarCraft II game. They can be used to modify map properties, such as unit capabilities, triggers, text translation, and computer artificial intelligence.
NOTE: Since SC2MOD files are saved in an MPQ format, they can be renamed with the ".mpq" extension and opened with an MPQ editor.
